chunks.zh: 35 岁，已婚已育，还有润的可能吗？
chunks.en: 35 years old, married with children, is there still a possibility of emigrating?

chunks.zh: 了解了一下明年孩子上小学的政策，心凉了。
chunks.en: After looking into the policies for my child entering elementary school next year, I'm disheartened.

chunks.zh:
本来是要打算回老家上学的，但是现在媳妇又想留京上学。

目前在帝都，失业中。
chunks.en: Originally, I planned to go back to my hometown for schooling, but now my wife wants to stay in Beijing. Currently in Beijing, unemployed.

chunks.zh:
唯一破局的办法就是找到个办理工作居住证的工作，否则只能回原籍了。

储蓄不多，没有雅思没有日语等级，不知道还有无润的可能？
chunks.en: The only way to break the deadlock is to find a job that can obtain a work permit, otherwise I can only return to my place of origin. I don't have much savings, no IELTS or Japanese proficiency, I don't know if there is any possibility of emigration?

chunks.zh:
如果有的话还请指点一二。

（时常在看着老婆孩子的时候感到愧疚，抱歉没给老婆孩子一个好的未来。）
希望年轻人看到，能早做打算。
chunks.en: If there is, please give me some advice. (I often feel guilty when I look at my wife and children, sorry for not giving them a better future.) I hope young people can see this and plan ahead.

chunks.zh: 我带着老婆润日本的经历 https://springwood.me/new-life-in-japan/
chunks.en: My experience of emigrating to Japan with my wife: https://springwood.me/new-life-in-japan/

chunks.zh: 35 岁带着老婆和两孩子润到新加坡了，熬了快两年现在基本稳定了，准备申请 PR.
chunks.en: I emigrated to Singapore with my wife and two children at the age of 35. After nearly two years of hard work, I am now basically stable and preparing to apply for PR.

chunks.zh: 虽然 V 站主流都劝润，不过我唱个反调，你这条件太差了，还不如回老家。
chunks.en: Although the mainstream on V2EX advises emigration, I'll take a contrarian view. Your conditions are too poor, you might as well go back to your hometown.

chunks.zh: 外语不会，润出去也找不到好工作。
chunks.en: You don't know a foreign language, you won't find a good job if you emigrate.

chunks.zh: 老婆小孩等着你养呢，你让他们跟着你一起担风险吗？
chunks.en: Your wife and children are waiting for you to support them, are you going to let them take risks with you?

chunks.zh: 太不负责任了。
chunks.en: That's too irresponsible.

chunks.zh: @ramirezyolis808 #41 怎么说呢，分享几个自己了解的情况然后自己判断吧。
chunks.en: @ramirezyolis808 #41 Well, let me share some information I know and you can judge for yourself.

chunks.zh: *并不准确，以下都是私以为。
chunks.en: *Not accurate, the following are just my personal opinions.

chunks.zh: 1. 小鬼子很排外，一般纯日企里中国人很难到技术高层。
chunks.en: 1. The Japanese are very xenophobic, and it is generally difficult for Chinese people to reach senior technical positions in purely Japanese companies.

chunks.zh: 2. 日本喜欢论资排辈，升迁需要熬很多年，尤其是派遣过去的，在大点的公司光“正社员”这一步就要几年。
chunks.en: 2. Japan favors seniority, and promotion requires many years of hard work, especially for those dispatched from overseas. In larger companies, it takes several years just to become a 'regular employee'.

chunks.zh: 3. 疫情前中级码农东京的薪资差不多是国内大城市的 1.5 倍，消费也差不多是 1.5-2 倍。
chunks.en: 3. Before the epidemic, the salary of a mid-level coder in Tokyo was about 1.5 times that of a major city in China, and the cost of living was also about 1.5-2 times.

chunks.zh: 但这几年日本汇率跌得厉害。
chunks.en: But the Japanese exchange rate has fallen sharply in recent years.

chunks.zh: @qingpei88800 北京工作居住证 == 北京绿卡，除了不能参加高考，在买房、摇车号、义务教育阶段是视同京籍的。
chunks.en: @qingpei88800 Beijing Work Permit == Beijing Green Card, except for not being able to participate in the college entrance examination, it is considered the same as a Beijing resident in terms of buying a house, lottery for car license plates, and compulsory education.

chunks.zh: @magic3584 非京读书也不是不可以，我也是这样一路过来的。
chunks.en: @magic3584 It's not impossible to study outside of Beijing, that's how I came all the way.

chunks.zh: 最初办五证，后来有工居之后就用工居上学。
chunks.en: Initially, I applied for the five certificates, and later I used the work permit to go to school.

chunks.zh: 如果不想娃留守，也不想去天津读书，你可以在小学阶段就考虑让娃走国际路线（从小就把英语搞好，在初三的时候，托福成绩在 115 左右），这样，上公立高中国际部（不过很卷，主要非京太多名额太少，如果有工居视同京籍会好很多，8-12 万一年）。
chunks.en: If you don't want your child to be left behind or go to Tianjin to study, you can consider letting your child take the international route in elementary school (learn English well from an early age, and have a TOEFL score of around 115 in the third year of junior high school), so that you can go to the international department of a public high school (but it's very competitive, mainly because there are too many non-Beijing residents and too few places, if you have a work permit, it will be much better, 80,000-120,000 a year).

chunks.zh: 除了托福外还要看中考成绩。
chunks.en: In addition to TOEFL, you also need to look at the high school entrance examination results.

chunks.zh: 不知道你打算让娃在哪个区读书，如果有条件，还是在海淀或西城吧，至少这二个区的公立高中国际部招生名额比较多。
chunks.en: I don't know which district you plan to send your child to school in, if possible, Haidian or Xicheng, at least these two districts have more enrollment quotas for the international departments of public high schools.

chunks.zh: 如果没有工居，可以考虑朝阳区的人朝分（私立、好像是 16 万一年），可以初中走 1+3 不参加中考直接上高中国际部。
chunks.en: If you don't have a work permit, you can consider Renchao Branch in Chaoyang District (private, it seems to be 160,000 a year), you can take the 1+3 route in junior high school without participating in the high school entrance examination and go directly to the international department of high school.

chunks.zh: 不过，走国际部的问题是，资金需求不少，至少当下，3 年高中下来，至少 50 万吧。
chunks.en: However, the problem with going to the international department is that it requires a lot of money, at least for now, at least 500,000 for 3 years of high school.

chunks.zh: 出国一年按 50 万算，本科毕业下来估计得近 300 万。
chunks.en: Calculate 500,000 per year for studying abroad, and it is estimated that it will cost nearly 3 million to graduate from undergraduate.

chunks.zh: @mesh 现在的出生率 这些都不是事了，不慌
chunks.en: @mesh The current birth rate means these are not issues anymore, don't panic.

chunks.zh: 赚钱还是国内好点吧。
chunks.en: It's better to make money in China.

chunks.zh: 除非你是技术人才高新外企挖你。
chunks.en: Unless you are a skilled technical professional headhunted by a high-paying foreign company.

chunks.zh: 二线城市挺好的。
chunks.en: Second-tier cities are pretty good.

chunks.zh: 首都上学你没有优势的。
chunks.en: You don't have an advantage studying in the capital.

chunks.zh: 因为他们政策年年改。
chunks.en: Because their policies change every year.

chunks.zh: 今年你赶上了，6 年之后还是赶不上。
chunks.en: You might catch up this year, but you won't catch up in 6 years.

chunks.zh: 本质时候一个裁判员随时修改规则的游戏，而你作为运动员，在每次都修改规则之后重新调整方向，永远赶不上的。
chunks.en: In essence, it's a game where the referee changes the rules at any time, and you, as an athlete, always have to readjust your direction after each change, and you'll never catch up.

chunks.zh: 存款 50-100w 够未来 10 年了。
chunks.en: 500,000-1,000,000 in savings is enough for the next 10 years.

chunks.zh: 小孩自己教就行了。
chunks.en: Just teach the children yourself.

chunks.zh: 学校学不到什么的。
chunks.en: You can't learn anything at school.

chunks.zh: 除了各种攀比砸资源，例如有钱的卷马术高尔夫国际部，普通的卷高考，其实都没用。
chunks.en: Except for all kinds of comparisons and resource investments, such as the rich competing for equestrianism, golf, international departments, and the ordinary competing for the college entrance examination, it's actually useless.

chunks.zh: 本质你无法预知未来。
chunks.en: In essence, you can't predict the future.

chunks.zh: 如果实在要教，就教他们如何在变化中求生存。
chunks.en: If you really want to teach, teach them how to survive in change.

chunks.zh: 未来是动态发展的，你无法现在就知道标准答案告诉你的小孩。
chunks.en: The future is dynamically developing, you can't know the standard answer now to tell your child.

chunks.zh: 不过有一点我很确定。
chunks.en: But one thing I'm sure of.

chunks.zh: 就是 50-100 真的够了。
chunks.en: That is, 500,000-1,000,000 is really enough.

chunks.zh: 因为未来物价很便宜的。
chunks.en: Because prices will be very cheap in the future.

chunks.zh: 不信你看看猪肉价格。
chunks.en: If you don't believe me, look at pork prices.

chunks.zh: 再有就是，作为家长，不能放弃对历史和金融的学习，，因为这两块世界任何一个大学都不会教的，你不教你的小孩，它去哪都学不到，除非自学能力很厉害，又被社会伤害之后很坚强，那么它可以在实践中学习，否则的话，早教早好/金融 历史 博弈论 统计学 生物学 心理学  简单的数据分析  人机沟通 异性相处 如何处理分歧和矛盾   身体健康这几个学科学好久够了。
chunks.en: Furthermore, as parents, you can't give up learning about history and finance, because no university in the world teaches these two subjects. If you don't teach your children, they won't learn them anywhere, unless they have strong self-learning abilities and are strong after being hurt by society, then they can learn in practice, otherwise, early education is better / Finance History Game Theory Statistics Biology Psychology Simple data analysis Human-computer communication Relationships with the opposite gender How to deal with disagreements and conflicts Physical health It's enough to learn these subjects well.

chunks.zh: 因为这些是可以穿越经济周期的。
chunks.en: Because these can survive economic cycles.

chunks.zh: 二线是不错的。
chunks.en: Second tier is not bad.

chunks.zh: 贸然润你会被中介骗死。
chunks.en: If you emigrate rashly, you will be scammed to death by agents.

chunks.zh: 立足二线再找出差机会出去考察  这样润可能风险小？
chunks.en: Base yourself in a second-tier city and then look for business trip opportunities to go out for inspections. Is this a lower risk way to emigrate?

chunks.zh: 另外除非双方父母可以不用你管  否则你润了他们也是白瞎  老了没人管 很惨 到时候你又内疚的。
chunks.en: Also, unless you don't need to take care of both parents, otherwise if you emigrate, they will be useless, and it will be miserable if no one takes care of them when they are old, and you will feel guilty at that time.

chunks.zh: /‘没办法 我们是一个福利很不咋样的地方  都是上下 3 代人互相锁死  有能力逃脱的很少  都需要强劲的经济实力才能做到
chunks.en: /'Unfortunately, we are a place with very poor welfare, and 3 generations of families are locked together. Very few people have the ability to escape. It all requires strong economic strength to do it.

chunks.zh: 对于比较传统的人来说, 润的阻力大多来源于父母的养老...
chunks.en: For more traditional people, the resistance to emigrating mostly comes from their parents' retirement...

chunks.zh: 35 岁，带着妻小，帝都失业，储蓄不多，没有雅思没有日语等级，buff 直接拉满，就别想润的事情了吧
chunks.en: 35 years old, with wife and children, unemployed in Beijing, not much savings, no IELTS and no Japanese level, the buffs are fully stacked, so don't even think about emigrating.

chunks.zh: @wxw752  别提了，我河南的，豫东地区，2012 年的参加的高考，我们初中高中那会，学校都是 4 点半起床 9 点半下晚自习，最后就那 20%左右考入本科......抱怨不公平也没用啊
chunks.en: @wxw752 Don't mention it, I'm from Henan, eastern Henan, I took the college entrance examination in 2012. When we were in junior high and high school, the school got up at 4:30 in the morning and got out of self-study at 9:30 in the evening, and finally only about 20% were admitted to undergraduate ... complaining about injustice is useless.

chunks.zh: 看现有描述，猜想楼主积蓄也不一定充裕，有三口人在国外生活一、两年的额度的话，可以考虑孩子申请枫叶国小学，然后两口子过去陪读的路子...
chunks.en: Looking at the current description, I guess the poster's savings may not be abundant. If there is enough money for a family of three to live abroad for a year or two, you can consider applying for elementary school in Canada, and then the couple can go there to accompany the child...

chunks.zh: 然后用一年的 Buffer 研究怎么活下去，你媳妇可以申请上学，你就可以有个工签啥...具体去查查吧，去年身边有一个朋友就这么全家润的（只能算预润吧）
chunks.en: Then use a year's buffer to study how to survive, your wife can apply to school, and you can get a work visa or something... Check it out, a friend of mine emigrated with his whole family like this last year (it can only be considered pre-emigration)

chunks.zh: 老哥，看完介绍感觉不是想 run ，是香逃避呢....
chunks.en: Bro, after reading the introduction, I feel like you don't want to emigrate, but you want to escape...

chunks.zh: 我有朋友年近 40 还带着老婆和两个孩子一润澳了……这事只是一个决心的问题。
chunks.en: I have a friend who emigrated to Australia with his wife and two children when he was almost 40... It's just a matter of determination.

chunks.zh: 同一个国家为了孩子上学搞得像移民一样，哈哈
chunks.en: It's like immigrating for the sake of the child's schooling in the same country, haha.

chunks.zh: 现在学校真的学不到什么。
chunks.en: You really can't learn anything at school now.

chunks.zh: 但凡自我意识高，自学能力强的高中生，早就高中可以出去创业，休学了，家里留足钱给他创业失败继续念书。
chunks.en: As long as a high school student has a high degree of self-awareness and strong self-learning ability, they can go out to start a business in high school, suspend school, and the family will leave enough money for him to continue studying if the business fails.

chunks.zh: 真牛人高中就很牛了，即使上大学也是自学的，大学真的学不到什么。
chunks.en: The real geniuses are already awesome in high school, even if they go to college, they are self-taught, and they really can't learn anything at college.

chunks.zh: 大学课本你看看都是哪年编写的了，赶得上时代发展吗？
chunks.en: Look at the textbooks in college, what year were they written? Can they keep up with the development of the times?

chunks.zh: 社会三个月比大学一年学的还多。
chunks.en: Three months in society is more than a year in college.

chunks.zh: 就 2 条路，它以后进体制内，那必须高文凭拿到手。
chunks.en: There are only 2 paths. If they enter the system in the future, they must get a high degree.

chunks.zh: 以后体制外，就学会经济，历史，金融，沟通，心理学，博弈论，这些体制外求生存就可以了。
chunks.en: If they are outside the system in the future, they can learn economics, history, finance, communication, psychology, and game theory to survive outside the system.

chunks.zh: 社会是动态变化的，要在变化中生存。
chunks.en: Society is dynamically changing, and you must survive in change.

chunks.zh: 夫妻俩管理好自己的养老钱，小孩就很感激了呢。
chunks.en: If the couple manages their retirement money well, the children will be very grateful.

chunks.zh: 不像我家里人，一直被骗钱，我要一直给他们的养老钱填坑，我家人不会跟着时代进步而学习就喜欢相信骗子，苦不堪言。
chunks.en: Unlike my family, who are always being scammed, I have to keep filling the hole with their pension money. My family doesn't follow the times and learn, so they like to believe in scammers, it's unspeakable pain.

chunks.zh: 就是一个自学的时代。
chunks.en: It's a self-study era.

chunks.zh: 不信你看看你小孩课本，你看看就知道，什么都学不到。
chunks.en: If you don't believe me, look at your child's textbook, you'll see that you can't learn anything.

chunks.zh: 一周 4 节思想课。
chunks.en: 4 ideology classes a week.

chunks.zh: 是知识改变命运，不是文凭改变命运。
chunks.en: It is knowledge that changes fate, not education.

chunks.zh: 并且，知识，是动态变化的。
chunks.en: And, knowledge is dynamically changing.

chunks.zh: 实话实说，国内都混的不如意出去了大概率更不如意，连话都说不明白怎么整？
chunks.en: To be honest, if you are not doing well in China, you will probably do worse if you go out, how can you manage if you can't even speak the language?

chunks.zh: 那些发帖子过的好要么 buff 拉满要么万里挑一。
chunks.en: Those who post that they are doing well are either fully buffed or one in a million.

chunks.zh: 有那个精神不如在国内卷，起码中文你会说能听。
chunks.en: With that spirit, it's better to stay in China, at least you can speak and understand Chinese.

chunks.zh: @xixibb 不是这样的，你坐下。
chunks.en: @xixibb That's not true, sit down.

chunks.zh: 我也 35 ，坐标澳洲。
chunks.en: I'm also 35, located in Australia.

chunks.zh: 技术我还比较自信。
chunks.en: I'm pretty confident in my technology.

chunks.zh: 但是 8 年没跳槽，所以收入在国内还没混到程序员中的中位数。
chunks.en: But I haven't changed jobs for 8 years, so my income in China hasn't even reached the median among programmers.

chunks.zh: 过来后收入直接 5 倍。
chunks.en: My income directly quintupled after coming here.
5 times.

chunks.zh: 这边没人 PUA ，精神压力也小。
chunks.en: There is no PUA here, and the mental stress is also small.

chunks.zh: 过得像个人，可以得到尊重。
chunks.en: I live like a person and can be respected.

chunks.zh: 年假没有过期作废的说法，积累多了反而强制你休息。
chunks.en: There is no concept of expiration of annual leave. If you accumulate too much, you are forced to rest.

chunks.zh: 加班，不存在的。
chunks.en: Overtime, doesn't exist.

chunks.zh: 有时候想早点完成东西，偷偷加班，还要等到第二天 commit ，不然可能被关心😂我过来也是很大程度因为下一代教育，打破放羊卖羊娶老婆的圈子。
chunks.en: Sometimes I want to finish things early and secretly work overtime, but I have to wait until the next day to commit, otherwise I might be cared about😂I also came here largely because of the education of the next generation, to break the cycle of raising sheep, selling sheep, and marrying a wife.

chunks.zh: @kevin1452 #155 Landing 经验是指的落地后吗？
chunks.en: @kevin1452 #155 Does the landing experience refer to after landing?

chunks.zh: 生活方面基本感觉跟在深圳没有区别，8 成都是华人，知识吃饭的口味偏福建，广东口味比较少。
chunks.en: In terms of life, it basically feels the same as in Shenzhen. 80% are Chinese, and the taste of food is more Fujianese, and there are fewer Cantonese tastes.

chunks.zh: 房租这两年正赶上最高峰，比前两年翻了一倍，而且一时半会也落不下去，只能硬扛着，或者退而求其次，组一些条件没那么好的地方。
chunks.en: Rent has been at its peak in the past two years, doubling compared to the previous two years, and it won't fall anytime soon, so you can only grit your teeth and hold on, or settle for second best and rent some places with less favorable conditions.

chunks.zh: 小孩上学比较麻烦，如果超过六岁了在这边不能直接上公立学校，只能先在国际学校读书，直到考过这边的入学考试才可以入学。
chunks.en: It is more troublesome for children to go to school. If they are over six years old, they cannot directly attend public schools here, they can only study in international schools first, until they pass the entrance examination here before they can enroll.

chunks.zh: 工作几年后我就润回老家了。。。一线城市租房成本太高了。。。
chunks.en: After working for a few years, I emigrated back to my hometown... The cost of renting in first-tier cities is too high...
